message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds tremendous value. I'm confident it can significantly benefit your business.  While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. To show my commitment to this potential partnership, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
